action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The border of the grid is filled with X's. Inside the border, there is an alternating pattern of blank spaces (▢) and X's, starting with a blank space in each corner of the inner 3x3 square. The pattern goes like this: blank, X, blank, X, blank in the first inner row, then repeats for the next two inner rows.
continue

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid consists of a 5x5 matrix. The border of the grid is filled with X's, creating a continuous frame around the grid. Inside this frame, there is an alternating pattern of X's and blank squares (▢). Starting from the second row, each row has an X in the first and last position, with alternating blank squares and X's in between. The pattern is such that the blank squares form a vertical line down the center of the grid, and two additional vertical lines, one space apart from the center line on either side. The result is a symmetrical pattern with X's at the corners and intersections, and blank squares in a "+" shape.
continue

The pattern goes like this: blank, X, blank, X, blank in the first inner row, then repeats for the next two inner rows.
